body_html:
I tried that but backed out because something somewhere (don't remember exactly what) told me in effect: you can't get there from here.

Oh yes, it was probably because I didn't find an 8.0-compatible cudNN ...

https://developer.nvidia.com/rdp/cudnn-download


Download cuDNN v5.1 RC (June 19, 2016), for CUDA 8.0 RC

cuDNN 5.1 RC for CUDA 8RC will be available soon - please check back again.

Yes, that's what sent me back to 7.5.

Ah wait a min:

Download cuDNN v5 (May 27, 2016), for CUDA 8.0 RC

Oh well, it doesn't hurt to go through these drills multiple times.

Thanks @flx42

body:
I tried that but backed out because something somewhere (don't remember exactly what) told me in effect: you can't get there from here.

Oh yes, it was probably because I didn't find an 8.0-compatible cudNN ...

```
https://developer.nvidia.com/rdp/cudnn-download


Download cuDNN v5.1 RC (June 19, 2016), for CUDA 8.0 RC

cuDNN 5.1 RC for CUDA 8RC will be available soon - please check back again.

```

Yes, that's what sent me back to 7.5.

Ah wait a min:

`Download cuDNN v5 (May 27, 2016), for CUDA 8.0 RC
`

Oh well, it doesn't hurt to go through these drills multiple times.

Thanks @flx42
